item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 22, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Show HN: FastOpenAPI – automated docs for many Python frameworks (42 points | 29 comments)

7. Monster Cables picked the wrong guy to threaten (2008) (435 points | 132 comments)

22. ‘Bluey’s World’: How a Cute Aussie Puppy Became a Juggernaut (304 points | 265 comments)
